sub_title: Content Strategist at NorthernLight | Coach & workshop facilitator at Inner Purpose | Presenter ‘eXpeditie’ at Mosasaurus Film
summary:
Graduated as an archaeologist, I quickly realized that my curiosity and forte lies in telling stories about the unknown. How do we make difficult and ‘dusty’ topics like archaeology and science engaging and tangible for bigger audiences? In order to do that, we have to find the underlying story and urgency of the project, and communicate it in such a way that it touches and inspires. 

My love for storytelling and creating narratives, has led me to work in public archaeology and as a researcher and script writer for National Geographic Channel. Currently, I’m a content strategist for NorthernLight, a creative Amsterdam-based agency that creates transformative experiences for brands, museums and public spaces. Experiences that open up minds and widen perspectives. I’m proud to say that NorthernLight has done over 200 projects in 30 different countries.

Being a good listener, I’m sincerely interested in how people think and what motivates them. I have an endless fascination for the deeper meaning behind someone's action and words - I believe all it takes to get there, is asking the right questions.
